00022     class camera
00023     {
00024         friend class viewport;
00025         
00026     public:
00030         camera(const size& frustum)
00031         : frustum_(frustum)
00032         , rotation_(0.0f)
00033         , zoom_(1.0f)
00034         , position_(0.0f, 0.0f)
00035         {            
00036         }
00037         
00042         void position(const vector_2d& v)
00043         {
00044             position_ = v;
00045         }
00046         
00051         void rotation(float angle)
00052         {
00053             if(angle < 0.0f) 
00054             {
00055                 angle = 360.0f + angle;    
00056             }
00057             
00058             rotation_ = clamp(angle, 0.0f, 360.0f);
00059         }
00060         
00065         void zoom(float z)
00066         {
00067             zoom_ = z;
00068         }
00069         
00070         void apply()
00071         {
00072             glLoadIdentity();
00073 
00074             // move to center of screen
00075             glTranslatef(frustum_.width / 2.0f, 
00076                          frustum_.height / 2.0f, 0.0);
00077             
00078             // rotate about center of screen
00079             if(rotation_ != 0.0f)
00080             {
00081                 glRotatef(rotation_, 0, 0, 1);
00082             }
00083 
00084             // zoom scene
00085             if(zoom_ != 1.0f)
00086             {
00087                 glScalef(zoom_, zoom_, 1.0);
00088             }
00089 
00090             // move to camera position
00091             glTranslatef(position_.X(), position_.Y(), 0.0);
00092         }
00093         
00094         // inverse of 'apply' on point in space
00095         const point inverted_transformation(const point& p)
00096         {
00097             affine_matrix m = affine_matrix::translation(-frustum_.width/2.0f, -frustum_.height/2.0f);
00098             m              *= affine_matrix::rotate( math::to_rad(360.0f-rotation_) );
00099             m              *= affine_matrix::scale(1.0f/zoom_, 1.0f/zoom_);
00100             m              *= affine_matrix::translation(-position_.X(), -position_.Y());
00101             return m.apply(p);
00102         }
00103 
00104     private:
00105         size        frustum_;
00106         
00107         float       rotation_;
00108         float       zoom_;        
00109         vector_2d   position_;
00110     };
